summary:
Amazon is a huge American company that started as an online bookstore in 1994. It's now known for many things, like selling all kinds of products online, offering cloud computing services, and making devices like Kindle e-readers and Echo speakers. Amazon also provides streaming services for video and music.

The company has grown a lot and has bought other businesses like Whole Foods and MGM. It's one of the biggest online retailers and has a large presence in cloud services and streaming. Amazon is known for changing how businesses work with its new ideas and technologies.
title: Amazon (company)
